comments.text:
If a modal window offers to open a resource through an external app (think
for instance of a modal dialog in BlueGriffon containing a link to an
external helper web page), the application chooser opened by
nsContentDispatchChooser.js is unresponsive and the user must first close
the modal dialog to make its app choice.

Tested in BlueGriffon 1.1 and forthcoming 1.2 (based on mozilla-central
16-sep-2011)

I think the only viable strategy here is to open the app chooser as modal
if there is already a modal window displayed and active. Patch pending.
